src:
Kepa Merasa Beruntung Dilatih oleh Frank Lampard
07 Nov 2019, 19:27 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Kiper Chelsea Kepa Arrizabalaga mengaku dirinya beruntung memiliki Frank Lampard sebagai manajernya.
Lampard menangani Chelsea pada musim 2019-20 ini. Ia menggantikan Maurizio Sarri yang memilih balik ke Italia dan menangani Juventus.
Lampard diprediksi tak akan bisa membawa Chelsea meraih prestasi bagus pada musim ini. Prediksi itu seakan akurat setelah di awal musim ini The Blues tampil kurang meyakinkan.
Akan tetapi seiring waktu performa Chelsea mampu membaik. The Blues bahkan berhasil meraih delapan kemenangan dari sembilan laga terakhirnya di semua ajang kompetisi.
Chelsea pun kini tak dipandang sebelah mata lagi. Mereka bahkan disebut berpeluang untuk bisa finis di zona empat besar EPL di akhir musim nanti.
text:
Feel Lucky To Be Trained by Frank Lampard
Nov 7 2019, 19:27 by Bola.net
Chelsea goalkeeper Kepa Arrizabalaga claims he is fortunate to have Frank Lampard as his manager.
Lampard handles Chelsea in this 2019-20 season. He replaces Maurizio Sarri who chose to return to Italy and handle Juventus.
Lampard is predicted to not be able to bring Chelsea to achieve good achievements this season. The prediction seemed accurate after the beginning of this season the Blues appeared less convincing.
However, over time Chelsea's performance can improve. The Blues even won eight of their last nine matches in all competitions.
Chelsea are now no longer underestimated. They even called the chance to finish in the top four EPL zone at the end of the season.
